indicator: Online job vacancies (ICT professionals)
description: Vacancies for ICT professionals in websites collected as part of the OVATE project
geographical_coverage: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Germany, Hungary, Spain, Finland, France, Italy, Ireland, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Sweden, Slovakia and the United Kingdom
observations: Data not currently available for download. Detailed skills data also available by country

indicator: Digital talent in/out migration
description: In / out migration by skills group and base/target country based on LinkedIn data

indicator: % of enterprises that employ ICT specialists
description: Enterprises that employ ICT specialists

indicator: Enterprises that recruited or tried to recruit ICT specialists
description: Enterprises that recruited or tried to recruit ICT specialists
observations: Includes information about difficulty filling vacancies and company size and sector

indicator: Enterprises - ICT functions performed
description: Enterprises - ICT functions performed (whether the company outsources ICT / web / office functions, or they are developed internally)
observations: Includes information about type of function and source of supply, company size and sector.

indicator: Number of open source software developers
description: Number of open source developers participating in GitHub
observations: GitHub is the world biggest platform for open source software development but it has competitors which may be more popular in other countries

indicator: Number of digital technology networking groups
description: Number of groups in the tech category
observations: We have a system to collect this data automatically. Meetup's API was updated recently, and this might require some changes to update the data.

indicator: Number of unique participants in technology networking groups
description: Number of individuals who are members of groups in the tech meetup category

indicator: Python package downloads
description: Number of Python package downloads by country
observations: It is possible to obtain similar information about R package downloads

indicator: Number of questions and answers by country
description: Number of questions and answers related to digital technologies by country

indicator: Employees educated in Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics
description: Employed HRST with tertiary education by age, field of education and occupation

indicator: Employed in High technology sectors
description: Employed HRST by category, age and NACE Rev. 2 activity

indicator: R&D personnel in ICT sector as % of total R&D personnel by NACE Rev. 2 activity
description: R&D personnel in ICT sector as % of total R&D personnel by NACE Rev. 2 activity

indicator: Employment by sex, age and sector (ICT)
description: Employment by sex, age and economic activity (from 2008 onwards, NACE Rev. 2) - 1 000

indicator: Students enrolled in ICT fields of study
description: Students enrolled in ICT fields of study
geographical_coverage: FR, DE, PL, IT, UK, TR, RO, PT, ES, CZ, AT, BE, NL, BG, HU, GR, NO, LV, SI, LT, FI, RS, AL, SE, HR, CH, DK, SK, IE, EE, CY, MK, ME, IS, MT, LU, LI

indicator: Graduates in ICT fields of study
description: Graduates in ICT fields of study

indicator: Academic staff in ICT fields of study
description: Academic staff in ICT fields of study

indicator: Number of computer science programmes being taught
description: Number of computer science programmes available
observations: Can be decomposed into course level (undergraduate, masters, postgraduate), years of study and tuition fee. Data can be analyed to identify courses in specific subjects - cybersecurity, artificial intelligence...

indicator: Graduates in Information & Communication Technologies
description: Graduates by education level, programme orientation, sex and field of education
observations: Can be decomposed into level of education (bachelors, MSc, PhD) and gender. Some of this information is also available from educ_uoe_grad normalised by different age cohorts

indicator: Students in Information & Communication Technologies
description: Students enrolled in tertiary education by education level, programme orientation, sex and field of education

indicator: Employed ICT specialists - total
description: Employed ICT specialists - total
observations: Information also available by sex, age and educational attainment

indicator: Persons with ICT education by labour status
description: Persons with ICT education by labour status
observations: Information also available by sex, age and educational attainment

indicator: Enterprises that provided training to develop/upgrade ICT skills of their personnel
description: Enterprises that provided training to develop/upgrade ICT skills of their personnel
observations: Available by company size and sector
